data.persona: I spread gossip throughout the kingdom. I wear the finest of clothes. I am always protected from the outcomes of my villainy.
data.description:
You are in the Grand Ballroom.
There is a large marbled floor with ornate inlay-ed floor decorations.  The ceiling is tall and also ornately decorated with beautiful plaster decorations that touches by gold lining.  The space is high and well lit with many windows but has a dark musky smell.
There's a ceiling, a windows, a marbled floor, a flag, a decoration, and a floor decorations here.
The royal family and the waiter are here.

You are carrying a money and a key, wearing a royal coat of arms and a Jacket, and wielding a Daggers.

data.short_motivation: I want to bribe the royal family
data.mid_motivation: I want the royal family to continue to take my spoils and protect me
data.long_motivation: I want the be able to continue my villainy and not have to worry about consequences

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get praise and love from royal family

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go continue my villainy with no consequences
